dialogue: I literally cannot believe you are this gullible.
I can't wait to tweet about your stupidity.
Your dumbness will live forever on the internet!
You probably haven't seen the new data that proves I'm right.
Will you apologize like a decent human being? Or will you move the goalposts, claim victory, and trash my name like a demented weasel?
Can you tell me more about the weasel option?
